attr.title: Dead Knight
attr.desc: You are dead. Get yourself some body parts and you'll be fine.
attr.inst: Grab the game at itch.io (https://backterria.itch.io/dead-knight). Download it (an .exe file) and copy to this port's gamedata folder. Tested with Dead Knight v0-1.exe
attr.inst_md: Grab the game at [itch.io](https://backterria.itch.io/dead-knight). Download it (an .exe file) and copy to this port's *gamedata* folder. Tested with *Dead Knight v0-1.exe*
